BoolProperty.Name: Verbose
BoolProperty.Description: Execute verbosely. Show sub commands as they are run. (-V)

BoolProperty.Name: OutputMacros
BoolProperty.Description: Output list of macro definitions in effect. Use with -E. (-d)

StringListProperty.Name: SDCCPreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Command line definition of macros. Passed to the preprocessor. (-D<macro[=value]>)

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalIncludeDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: The additional location where the preprocessor will look for <..h> or "..h" files. (-I<path>)

StringListProperty.Name: AssertAnswer
StringListProperty.Description: Assert the answer answer for question, in case it is tested with a preprocessor conditional such as ‘#if #question(answer)’. ‘-A-’ disables the standard assertions that normally describe the target machine. (-Aquestion(answer))

StringListProperty.Name: PreprocessorUndefines
StringListProperty.Description: Undefine macro macro. ‘-U’ options are evaluated after all ‘-D’ options, but before any ‘-include’ and ‘-imacros’ options. (-Umacro)

EnumValue.Name: AllHeaders
EnumValue.Description: Tell the preprocessor to output a rule suitable for make describing the dependencies of each object file. For each source file, the preprocessor outputs one make-rule whose target is the object file name for that source file and whose dependencies are all the files ‘#include’d in it. This rule may be a single line or may be continued with ‘\’-newline if it is long. The list of rules is printed on standard output instead of the preprocessed C program. ‘-M’ implies ‘-E’ (-M).

EnumValue.Name: UserHeadersOnly
EnumValue.Description: Like ‘-M’ but the output mentions only the user header files included with ‘#include "file"’. Systemheader files included with ‘#include <file>’ are omitted. (-MM)

StringListProperty.Name: PreprocessorOptions
StringListProperty.Description: Pass the preprocessorOption to the preprocessor sdcpp. (-Wp preprocessorOption[,preprocessorOption]...)

StringListProperty.Name: AssemblerOptions
StringListProperty.Description: Pass the assemblerOption to the assembler sdcpp. (-Wa assemblerOption[,assemblerOption]...)

StringListProperty.Name: LinkerOptions
StringListProperty.Description: Pass the linkerOption to the linker sdcpp. (-Wl linkerOption[,linkerOption]...)

BoolProperty.Name: CompileOnly
BoolProperty.Description: Compile only; do not assemble or link. (-S)

BoolProperty.Name: CompileAndAssemble
BoolProperty.Description: Compile and assemble, but do not link. (-c --compile-only)

BoolProperty.Name: PreprocessOnly
BoolProperty.Description: Preprocess only, do not compile. (-E --preprocessonly)

BoolProperty.Name: C1Mode
BoolProperty.Description: Act in c1 mode. The standard input is preprocessed code, the output is assembly code. (--c1mode)

BoolProperty.Name: PrintSearchDirs
BoolProperty.Description: Display the directories in the compiler's search path. (--print-search-dirs)

BoolProperty.Name: VCOutput
BoolProperty.Description: Messages are compatible with Micro$oft visual studio. (--vc)

BoolProperty.Name: UseStdOut
BoolProperty.Description: Send errors to stdout instead of stderr. (--use-stdout)

BoolProperty.Name: NoStdLib
BoolProperty.Description: Do not include the standard library directory in the search path. (--nostdlib)

BoolProperty.Name: NoStdInc
BoolProperty.Description: Do not include the standard include directory in the search path. (--nostdlib)

BoolProperty.Name: LessPedantic
BoolProperty.Description: Disable some of the more pedantic warnings. (--less-pedantic)

BoolProperty.Name: WarnErrors
BoolProperty.Description: Treat Warnings as Errors. (--Werror)

BoolProperty.Name: Debug
BoolProperty.Description: Enable debugging symbol output. (--debug)

BoolProperty.Name: Cyclomatic
BoolProperty.Description: Display complexity of the compiled functions. (--cyclomatic)

EnumProperty.Name: CStandard
EnumProperty.Description: The C ISO Standard Format to use.

EnumValue.Name: std-c89
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C90 (aka ANSI C89) standard (slightly incomplete) (--std-c89).

EnumValue.Name: std-sdcc89
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C90 (aka ANSI C89) standard with SDCC extensions (--std-sdcc89).

EnumValue.Name: std-c95
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C95 (aka ISO C94) standard (slightly incomplete) (--std-c95).

EnumValue.Name: std-c99
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C99 standard (slightly incomplete) (--std-c99).

EnumValue.Name: std-sdcc99
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C99 standard with SDCC extensions (--std-sdcc99).

EnumValue.Name: std-c11
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C11 standard (slightly incomplete) (--std-c11).

EnumValue.Name: std-sdcc11
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C11 standard with SDCC extensions (default) (--std-sdcc11).

EnumValue.Name: std-c2x
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C2X standard (slightly incomplete) (--std-c2x).

EnumValue.Name: std-sdcc2x
EnumValue.Description: Use ISO C2X standard with SDCC extensions (--std-sdcc2x).

BoolProperty.Name: DollarsInId
BoolProperty.Description: Permit '$' as an identifier character. (--fdollars-in-identifiers)

BoolProperty.Name: SignedChar
BoolProperty.Description: Make 'char' signed by default. (--fsigned-char)

BoolProperty.Name: UseNonFree
BoolProperty.Description: Search / include non-free licensed libraries and header files. (--use-non-free)

EnumProperty.Name: PortType
EnumProperty.Description: The processor type to build for. (-m)

EnumValue.Name: mcs51
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Intel MCS51 family of processors.

EnumValue.Name: ds390
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Dallas DS80C390 processor.

EnumValue.Name: ds400
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Dallas DS80C400 processor.

EnumValue.Name: hc08
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Freescale/Motorola HC08 (aka 68HC08) family of processors.

EnumValue.Name: s08
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Freescale/Motorola S08 (aka 68HCS08, HCS08, CS08) family of processors.

EnumValue.Name: z80
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Zilog Z80 family of processors.

EnumValue.Name: z180
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Zilog Z180 family of processors.

EnumValue.Name: r2k
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Rabbit 2000 / Rabbit 3000 family of processors

EnumValue.Name: r3ka
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Rabbit 3000A family of processors.

EnumValue.Name: gbz80
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the LR35902 GameBoy Z80 processor

EnumValue.Name: tlcs90
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Toshiba TLCS-90 processor

EnumValue.Name: ez80_z80
EnumValue.DisplayName: Zilog eZ80 processor in Z80 mode
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Zilog eZ80 processor in Z80 mode.

EnumValue.Name: stm8
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the STMicroelectronics STM8 family of processors.

EnumValue.Name: pdk13
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for Padauk processors with 13 bit wide program memory.

EnumValue.Name: pdk14
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for Padauk processors with 14 bit wide program memory.

EnumValue.Name: pdk15
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for Padauk processors with 15 bit wide program memory.

EnumValue.Name: pic14
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Microchip PIC 14-bit processors (p16f84 and variants. In development, not complete).

EnumValue.Name: pic16
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the Microchip PIC 16-bit processors (p18f452 and variants. In development, not complete).

EnumValue.Name: TININative
EnumValue.Description: Generate code for the TININative.

BoolProperty.Name: StackAuto
BoolProperty.Description: Stack automatic variables. (--stack-auto)

BoolProperty.Name: ExternalStack
BoolProperty.Description: Use external stack. (--xstack)

BoolProperty.Name: IntLongReent
BoolProperty.Description: Use reentrant calls on the int and long support functions. (--int-long-reent)

BoolProperty.Name: FloatReent
BoolProperty.Description: Use reentrant calls on the float support functions. (--float-reent)

BoolProperty.Name: XRamMovec
BoolProperty.Description: Use movc instead of movx to read xram (xdata). (--xram-movc)

StringListProperty.Name: CalleeSaves
StringListProperty.Description: Cause the called function to save registers instead of the caller. (--callee-saves <func[,func,...]>)

BoolProperty.Name: Profile
BoolProperty.Description: On supported ports, generate extra profiling information. (--profile)

BoolProperty.Name: OmitFramePointer
BoolProperty.Description: Leave out the frame pointer. (--fomit-frame-pointer)

BoolProperty.Name: AllCalleeSaves
BoolProperty.Description: Callee will always save registers used. (--all-callee-saves)

BoolProperty.Name: StackProbe
BoolProperty.Description: Insert call to function __stack_probe at each function prologue. (--stack-probe)

BoolProperty.Name: NoXinitOpt
BoolProperty.Description: Don't memcpy initialized xram from code. (--no-xinit-opt)

BoolProperty.Name: NoCCodeInAsm
BoolProperty.Description: Don't include C-Code as comments in the asm file. (--no-c-code-in-asm)

BoolProperty.Name: NoPeepComments
BoolProperty.Description: Don't include peephole optimizer comments. (--no-peep-comments)

StringProperty.Name: CodeSeg
StringProperty.Description: Use this name for the code segment. (--codeseg <name>)

StringProperty.Name: ConstSeg
StringProperty.Description: Use this name for the const segment. (--constseg <name>)

StringProperty.Name: DataSeg
StringProperty.Description: Use this name for the data segment. (--dataseg <name>)

BoolProperty.Name: NoOverlay
BoolProperty.Description: Disable overlaying leaf function auto variables. (--nooverlay)

BoolProperty.Name: NoGcse
BoolProperty.Description: Disable the GCSE optimisation. (--nogcse)

BoolProperty.Name: NoLabelOpt
BoolProperty.Description: Disable label optimization. (--nolabelopt)

BoolProperty.Name: NoInvariant
BoolProperty.Description: Disable optimization of invariants. (--noinvariant)

BoolProperty.Name: NoInduction
BoolProperty.Description: Disable loop variable induction. (--noinduction)

BoolProperty.Name: NoLoopReverse
BoolProperty.Description: Disable the loop reverse optimization. (--noloopreverse)

BoolProperty.Name: NoPeep
BoolProperty.Description: Disable the peephole assembly file optimization. (--no-peep)

BoolProperty.Name: NoRegParams
BoolProperty.Description: On some ports, disable passing some parameters in registers. (--no-reg-params)

BoolProperty.Name: PeepAsm
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Enable Peephole Optimization on Inline Assembly
BoolProperty.Description: Enable peephole optimization on inline assembly. (--peep-asm)

BoolProperty.Name: PeepReturn
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Enable Peephole Optimization on Return Instructions
BoolProperty.Description: Enable peephole optimization for return instructions. (--peep-return)

BoolProperty.Name: NoPeepReturn
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Disable Peephole Optimization on Return Instructions
BoolProperty.Description: Disable peephole optimization for return instructions. (--no-peep-return)

StringProperty.Name: PeepFile
StringProperty.DisplayName: Disable Peephole Optimization on Return Instructions

EnumValue.Name: CodeSpeed
EnumValue.Description: Optimize for code speed rather than size. (--opt-code-speed).

EnumValue.Name: CodeSize
EnumValue.Description: Optimize for code size rather than speed. (--opt-code-size).

IntProperty.Name: MaxAllocsPerNode
IntProperty.Description: Maximum number of register assignments considered at each node of the tree decomposition. (--max-allocs-per-node)

BoolProperty.Name: NoLospre
BoolProperty.Description: Disable lospre. (--nolospre)

BoolProperty.Name: AllowUnsafeRead
BoolProperty.Description: Allow optimizations to read any memory location anytime. (--allow-unsafe-read)

BoolProperty.Name: NoStdLibCalls
BoolProperty.Description: Disable optimization of calls to standard library. (--nostdlibcall)

BoolProperty.Name: DumpAst
BoolProperty.Description: Dump front-end AST before generating i-code. (--dump-ast)

BoolProperty.Name: DumpICode
BoolProperty.Description: Dump the i-code structure at all stages. (--dump-i-code)

BoolProperty.Name: DumpGraphs
BoolProperty.Description: Dump graphs (control-flow, conflict, etc). (--dump-graphs)

BoolProperty.Name: ICodeInAsm
BoolProperty.Description: Include i-code as comments in the asm file. (--i-code-in-asm)

BoolProperty.Name: VerboseAsm
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Include Code Generator Comments in ASM
BoolProperty.Description: Include code generator comments in the asm output. (--fverbose-asm)

StringListProperty.Name: IncludeLibraries
StringListProperty.Description: Include the given library in the link. (-l<library>)

EnumValue.Name: Intel
EnumValue.Description: Output in Intel hex format. (--out-fmt-ihx).

EnumValue.Name: S19
EnumValue.Description: Output in S19 hex format. (--opt-fmt-s19).

EnumValue.Name: ELF
EnumValue.Description: Output in ELF hex format. (--opt-fmt-elf).

BoolProperty.Name: NoOptSdccInAsm
BoolProperty.Description: Do not emit .optsdcc in asm. (--no-optsdcc-in-asm)

BoolProperty.Name: ACallAJump
BoolProperty.Description: Use acall/ajmp instead of lcall/ljmp. (--acall-ajmp)

BoolProperty.Name: CalleeSavesBC
BoolProperty.Description: Force a called function to always save BC. (--callee-saves-bc)

BoolProperty.Name: DumpCallTree
BoolProperty.Description: Dump call tree in .calltree file. (--calltree)

BoolProperty.Name: DebugRAlloc
BoolProperty.Description: Dump register allocator debug file *.d. (--debug-ralloc)

BoolProperty.Name: DebugXtra
BoolProperty.Description: Show more debug info in assembly output. (--debug-xtra)

BoolProperty.Name: DEnablePeeps
BoolProperty.Description: Explicit enable of peepholes. (--denable-peeps)

BoolProperty.Name: EmitExterns
BoolProperty.Description: Emit externs list in generated asm. (--emit-externs)

BoolProperty.Name: NoOmitFramePointer
BoolProperty.Description: Do not omit frame pointer. (--fno-omit-frame-pointer)

BoolProperty.Name: TraceStackPointer
BoolProperty.Description: Trace stack pointer push/pop to overflow. (--gstack)

StringProperty.Name: IvtLocation
StringProperty.Description: Set address of interrupt vector table. (--ivt-loc=<value>)

BoolProperty.Name: LegacyBanking
BoolProperty.Description: Use legacy method to call banked functions. (--legacy-banking)

EnumValue.Name: Flat24
EnumValue.Description: Use the flat24 model. (--model-flat24).

EnumValue.Name: Huge
EnumValue.Description: Functions are banked, data in external space. (--model-huge).

EnumValue.Name: Large
EnumValue.Description: 16-bit address space for data, 24-bit for code. (--model-large).

EnumValue.Name: Medium
EnumValue.Description: 16-bit address space for both data and code. (--model-medium).

EnumValue.Name: Small
EnumValue.Description: 8-bit address space for data. (--model-small).

BoolProperty.Name: MPLABCompatability
BoolProperty.Description: Enable compatibility mode for MPLAB utilities (MPASM/MPLINK). (--mplab-comp)

BoolProperty.Name: NMOSz80
BoolProperty.Description: Generate workaround for NMOS Z80 when saving IFF2. (--nmos-z80)

BoolProperty.Name: NoCRT
BoolProperty.Description: Do not link any default run-time initialization module. (--no-crt)

BoolProperty.Name: NoExtendedInstructions
BoolProperty.Description: Forbid use of the extended instruction set (e.g., ADDFSR). (--no-extended-instructions)

BoolProperty.Name: NoOptimizeGoto
BoolProperty.Description: Do NOT use (conditional) BRA instead of GOTO. (--no-optimize-goto)

BoolProperty.Name: NoPCodeOptimization
BoolProperty.Description: Disable (slightly faulty) optimization on pCode. (--no-pcode-opt)

BoolProperty.Name: NoRetWithoutCall
BoolProperty.Description: Do not use ret independent of acall/lcall. (--no-ret-without-call)

BoolProperty.Name: NoStdCRT
BoolProperty.Description: For the z80/gbz80 do not link default crt0.rel. (--no-std-crt0)

BoolProperty.Name: NoWarnNonFree
BoolProperty.Description: Suppress warning on absent --use-non-free option. (--no-warn-non-free)

BoolProperty.Name: NoDefaultLibs
BoolProperty.Description: Do not link default libraries when linking. (--nodefaultlibs)

BoolProperty.Name: OldRegisterAllocator
BoolProperty.Description: Use old register allocator. (--oldralloc)

BoolProperty.Name: OptimizeCompares
BoolProperty.Description: Try to optimize some compares. (--optimize-cmp)

BoolProperty.Name: OptimizeDataFlow
BoolProperty.Description: Thoroughly analyze data flow (memory and time intensive!). (--optimize-df)

BoolProperty.Name: OutputElfFormat
BoolProperty.Description: Output executable in ELF format. (--out-fmt-elf)

BoolProperty.Name: ParamPassInBank1
BoolProperty.Description: Use Bank1 for parameter passing. (--parms-in-bank1)

BoolProperty.Name: PCodeVerbose
BoolProperty.Description: Dump pcode related info. (--pcode-verbose)

BoolProperty.Name: NoBANKSEL
BoolProperty.Description: Do not generate BANKSEL assembler directives. (--pno-banksel)

StringProperty.Name: ReplaceUdata
StringProperty.Description: Place udata variables at another section: udata_acs, udata_ovr, udata_shr. (--preplace-udata-with=<value>)

BoolProperty.Name: ProtectSpUpdate
BoolProperty.Description: Will disable interrupts during ESP:SP updates. (--protect-sp-update)

BoolProperty.Name: ReserveRegsIY
BoolProperty.Description: Do not use IY (incompatible with --fomit-frame-pointer). (--reserve-regs-iy)

EnumValue.Name: 10bitStack
EnumValue.Description: use the 10bit stack (default). (--stack-10bit).

EnumValue.Name: 8bitStack
EnumValue.Description: use the 8bit stack (default). (--stack-8bit).

StringProperty.Name: StackSize
StringProperty.Description: Sets the size if the argument passing stack (default: 16, minimum: 4). (--stack-size=<value>)

BoolProperty.Name: UseAccelerator
BoolProperty.Description: Generate code for ds390 arithmetic accelerator. (--use-accelerator)

BoolProperty.Name: ExtendedInstructionSet
BoolProperty.Description: Enable Extended Instruction Set/Literal Offset Addressing mode. (-y --extended)
